sentence.Network_en: a thoroughgoing revision of the text
sentence.Network_cn: 对文本认真仔细的校订

sentence.Network_en: It is quite possible to perform a thoroughgoing stability analysis by combining the existing models.
sentence.Network_cn: 用现有模型的组合来完成完整的稳定性分析是十分可能的.

sentence.Network_en: It was precisely because we did thoroughgoing work there.

PerfectNetExp.abs: thoroughfare 通路thoroughgoing 彻底的thoroughly 十分地
thoroughfare 道路, thoroughgoing 彻底, thoroughgoing 十足的
a thoroughgoing villain ., 一个十恶不赦的恶徒.

at last , it was some unclearness and uncertainty of the social theory of the New Democracy itself . it made Mao Zedong have to change it in carrying out the thoroughgoing principle of the theory .最后是新民主主义社会理论本身的某些不明晰和不确定性，使毛泽东在贯彻理论的彻底性原则时不能不将它加以改变。

list.abs: There must be a thoroughgoing socialist revolution on the political and ideological fronts too ., 必须还有一个政治战线上和一个思想战线上的彻底的社会主义革命.
his attitude was that of a Marxist , a thoroughgoing materialist .这是马克思主义者的态度，是彻底的唯物主义者的态度。
It is quite possible to perform a thoroughgoing stability analysis by combining the existing models ., 用现有模型的组合来完成完整的稳定性分析是十分可能的.

because our Party adopted a thoroughgoing land policy , it has won whole-hearted support from much broader masses of peasants than during the War of Resistance .由于我党采取了彻底的土地政策，使我党获得了比较抗日时期广大得多的农民群众的衷心拥护。

entry.def: You use thoroughgoing to emphasize that someone or something is fully or completely the type of person or thing specified.

example.ex: ...readers who are unhappy with such thoroughgoing materialism.
example.tran: 对这种十足的物质主义不满的读者

entry.def: If you describe a piece of work as thoroughgoing, you approve of it because it has been carefully and thoroughly put together.

example.tran: 对监狱环境的一次彻底检查
这本内容极其详尽的传记

means.word_mean: 2. without qualification; used informally as (often pejorative) intensifiers;

auth_sentence.content: No one could be such a thoroughgoing liar.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one could be such a thoroughgoing liar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one could be such a thoroughgoing liar.

auth_sentence.content: The New Grove, in twenty volumes, was...a thoroughgoing revision.
auth_sentence.res_content: The New Grove, in twenty volumes, was...a thoroughgoing revision.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The New Grove, in twenty volumes, was...a thoroughgoing revision.

auth_sentence.content: In certain respects, Weber's critique is the more thoroughgoing.
auth_sentence.res_content: In certain respects, Weber's critique is the more thoroughgoing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In certain respects, Weber's critique is the more thoroughgoing.
